title: SMNTY Classics: Why do kids love stuffed animals so much?
itunes:title: SMNTY Classics: Why do kids love stuffed animals so much?
description:
What's the childhood psychology of stuffed animals and other "transitional objects"? Why do 35 percent of adults still sleep with stuffed animals? Tune in to this classic episode to learn more, including a brief history of the teddy bear and why the stuff possum never caught on.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
